message: Neither async/await nor TPL Dataflow have easy ways to throttle within a time window. Whenever I have a requirement that deals with time, the best solution is almost always Reactive Extensions (Rx). Rx is similar to TPL Dataflow but has all the primitives regarding time, like time-based throttling. Rx does plug nicely into TPL Dataflow so you can use Rx for the things it does well (throttling in a time window) and TPL Dataflow for things it does well (parallel processing).
